textBeforeTable: Women's Sizing Chart Oops, There seems to be an issue Reviews ▲ TOMS run true to size and are available in medium width only. We recommend ordering the size you normally wear. If you are typically in between sizes, we recommend going with the smaller one since TOMS will stretch slightly as you break them in. Size Chart Sizing ▲ With every pair you purchase, TOMS will give a pair of new shoes to a child in need. One for One. One-piece mixed-rubber outsole for resilience, flexibility and durability Latex arch insert for added support TOMS classic suede insole with cushion for comfort Canvas upper with TOMS toe-stitch, and elastic V for easy on and off The foundation to the One for One movement: TOMS Original Classics. When Blake saw the traditional alpargata in Argentina, he recognized a solution to the shoeless children enduring hardship around him, and started TOMS.
